rdf:Description.dc:title: Child traffic safety : resource guide for educators, parents and the community 2003 resource guide for educators, parents and the community.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Traffic Safety Initiative.
Alberta. Alberta Transportation. Traffic Safety Initiative.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Accompanied by three booklets featuring the Kinetic Kids called Traffic safety workbook, book 1 K-gr.1, book 2, gr. 2-3 and Think! A traffic safety toolkit for your brain book 3 gr. 4-6.
Approved for use in Alberta schools.
AGPC: GPRC's copy of these materials all contained in 1 binder.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Safety education
Traffic safety
Traffic safety and children
School children
Accidents
